Description: Accounting Data Mart - disconnected from the main Data warehouse.
Benefits enrollment and tracking for all employees
Compliance system - All employees must access this system for internal training and compliance.
Customer Service. Returns.complaints. Consolidated system immediately upon acquisition.
Bakery system - originally created because the bakery was an add-on.  Custom Cake orders are done here.
Internal connection system for asking questions from one employee to another
In Store promotions tied to television commercials.
Original Operational Data Store. Brought online prior to the Enterprise Data Warehouse. Still active.
Store located Point of Sale system.
Labor scheduling system - encompass all hourly employees (Shipping grocery gas-stations etc.)
GIS application that not only has information about store location but also population information for the zip-codes near the store location.
Produce purchasing and shipping. Ensures that vegetables are farm to store in a finite period of time.
Loyalty system. Keeps track of reward points and discounts provided for return customers.
